style.description: function(f) {var type = f.get('balancer_type'); if (typeof type === 'undefined') {return 'rearrangement'; } return type;  }
style.label: function(f) {var balancer = f.get('balancer'); if(typeof balancer === 'undefined') {balancer = f.get('Name'); } var name = balancer.replace('Rearrangement:','');  return name;  }

onClick.url: function(track,f) {var wburl = ''; var balancer = f.get('balancer'); var name = balancer.replace('Rearrangement:','');  return wburl+'/db/get?name='+name+';class=Rearrangement';  }
onClick.label:
function() { var balancer = this.feature.get('balancer'); if(typeof balancer === 'undefined') {balancer = this.feature.get('Name'); } var name = balancer.replace('Rearrangement:',''); var type = this.feature.get('balancer_type'); if (typeof type === 'undefined') {type = 'rearrangement'; } var ref = this.feature.get('seq_id'); var start = this.feature.get('start'); var end = this.feature.get('end'); var locStr = ref+':'+start+'..'+end; var labelStr = 'Balancer: '+name+'
type:'+type+'
location: '+locStr; var notes = this.feature.get('Note'); if (!(typeof notes ==='undefined' )) {labelStr = labelStr+'
Notes: '+notes; } return labelStr; }
onClick.title: Feature in WormBase

metadata.shortInfo: This track shows the approximate location of balancers.
